name: Elatha FR4
flavor_text: The sun shines on both joy and grief.

frame.name: High-Impact Frame
frame.description: Slow-firing and high-damage. This weapon is more accurate when stationary and aiming down sights.

perks.description:
Omolon post sight. Short zoom. 
  •  Greatly increases handling speed
  •  Slightly increases range
perks.name: Candle PS

perks.description:
Strong battery life.
  •  Increases magazine size
perks.name: Enhanced Battery

perks.description: Increased ammo reserves. Faster reload, stow, and ready when you're crouching.
perks.name: Field Prep
